title: Schema for ATT&CK Groups - X MITRE Data Source

id.description: (STIX v2.0 required common property) A unique identifier for the data source.

type.description: (STIX v2.0 required) The type of object, 'x-mitre-data-source' is type 'bundle'

spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent the content in this Bundle.

id.description: A unique identifier for the data source.

created.description: The date and time the data source was first created.

created_by_ref.description: Specifies the ID of the Identity object that describes the entity that created this object.

external_references.description: A list of external references (e.g., URLs or other reference material) that provide more information about the software.

source_name.description: The name of the external source.

url.description: The URL of the external source.

modified.description: The date and time this version of the data source was last modified.

name.description: A string identifying the data source.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Data Source, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

x_mitre_version.description: The version of the object in format major.minor

x_mitre_attack_spec_version.description: Optional: This field tracks the version of the ATT&CK Spec used by the object.

x_mitre_modified_by_ref.description: The identity of the individual or organization which created the current version of the object.

x_mitre_platforms.description: List of platforms that apply to the technique.

x_mitre_domains.description: The domains the object is found in.

x_mitre_contributors.description: People and organizations who have contributed to the object.

x_mitre_collection_layers.description: List of places the data can be collected from.

x_mitre_deprecated.description: Optional: Whether the object has been deprecated

revoked.description: (STIX v2.0 optional common property) Whether the object has been revoked.
